description: Logan Reed, Robert Balint, Roland Dane, & Antonio Vega. There's a culprit on the loose and four deputies are fast on his trail. Searching for clues can get you hot and bothered, and this posse soon discovers how to find some release - in each other's crotches and asses until one by one they cum with great relief.
title: The Violation, Part 1: Seized, Scene #04
